attributes.action: Cascade some of the wealth of money generated by The Premier League to the lower leagues to prevent clubs going in to administration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Rotherham United the latest club linked with going in to administration, it is about time that some of the wealth from The Premiership be cascaded down to the lower leagues to prevent clubs going into administration.The FA refer to wanting to help football at grass roots level, well do something about it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
